00040 #ifndef actorcontainervector_cpp
00041 #define actorcontainervector_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "actorcontainervector.h"
00044 
00045 
00046 namespace phys
00047 {
00048     ActorContainerVector::ActorContainerVector (World* Parent_) : ActorContainerBase (Parent_)
00049     {
00050     }
00051 
00052     void ActorContainerVector::AddActor(ActorBase* ActorToAdd)
00053     {
00054         this->RecentlyAdded = ActorToAdd;
00055         this->push_back(ActorToAdd);
00056     }
00057 
00058     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::LastActorAdded()
00059     {
00060         return this->RecentlyAdded;
00061     }
00062 
00063     void ActorContainerVector::RemoveActor(ActorBase* ActorToRemove)
00064     {
00065         //we need to iterate through and remove all items of that match the actor to match the description in the container base
00066         for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00067         {
00068             if ( ActorToRemove == *c )
00069             {
00070                 c=this->erase(c);
00071             }
00072         }
00073     }
00074 
00075     void ActorContainerVector::RemoveActorAtCursor()
00076     {
00077         this->cursor=this->erase(this->cursor);
00078     }
00079 
00080     Whole ActorContainerVector::GetActorCount() const
00081     {
00082         return this->size();
00083     }
00084 
00085     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToFirst()
00086     {
00087         if(this->empty())
00088             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00089 
00090         this->cursor=this->begin();
00091     }
00092 
00093     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToPrevious()
00094     {
00095         if(this->empty())
00096             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00097 
00098         if(this->cursor != this->begin())
00099             this->cursor--;
00100     }
00101 
00102     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToNext()
00103     {
00104         if(this->empty())
00105             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00106 
00107         if(this->cursor != this->end())
00108             this->cursor++;
00109     }
00110 
00111     void ActorContainerVector::CursorToLast()
00112     {
00113         if(this->empty())
00114             throw("Cannot move Cursor in an empty container");
00115 
00116         this->cursor=this->end();
00117     }
00118 
00119     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::GetAtCursor() const
00120     {
00121         if(this->empty())
00122             throw("Cannot get from in an empty container");
00123 
00124         return *(this->cursor);
00125     }
00126 
00127     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::GetFirst() const
00128     {
00129         return *(this->begin());
00130     }
00131 
00132     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::GetLast() const
00133     {
00134         return *(this->end());
00135     }
00136 
00137     String ActorContainerVector::GetType() const
00138     {
00139         String temp("phys::ActorContainerVector");
00140         return temp;
00141     }
00142 
00143     ActorBase* ActorContainerVector::FindActor(Ogre::Node* GraphicsNode)
00144     {
00145         //we need to iterate through and remove all items of that match the actor to match the description in the container base
00146         for( vector<ActorBase*>::iterator c=this->begin(); c!=this->end(); c++)
00147         {
00148             if ( GraphicsNode == GetNode(*c) )
00149             { return this->GetAtCursor(); }
00150         }
00151         return NULL;
00152     }
00153 }
